definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: noise (prop. of devastation, storm);—MT only pl. [[תְּשֻׁאוֹת]] abs. city noises Is 22:2 (of [[עִיר הוֹמִיׇּה]]), adv. acc. = (with) shoutings Zec 4:7; so cstr. [[נוֹגֵשׂ לאׁ יִשְׁמָָע]] ´[[ת]]: Job 39:7 (subj. wild ass); [[סֻכָּתוֹ]] ´[[ת]]: Job 36:29 (of thunder); read perh. sg. [[תְּשֻׁוׇה]] (= [[תְּישׁאָה]]) Job 30:22 Kt, dissolvest me in (or, into) the roar of the storm (‖ make me ride on wind), so Ew Ol De Di Du Bu al.; > [[תֻּשִׁיׇּה]] Qr AV my substance (?), Du ´[[מִתֻּשׁ]]: ‘ohne Halt’ (?).
